bug.author: ebetica
bug.description:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/TorchCraft/TorchCraft/blob/develop/BWEnv/src/utils.cc#L132>https://github.com/TorchCraft/TorchCraft/blob/develop/BWEnv/src/utils.cc#L132</denchmark-link>
If we overwrite "map", it will also take out "mapiteration" because "map" is a prefix of "mapiteration". Better to regex for prefix + "\s*=" instead. Will make the change when I get around to it.

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ebetica>@ebetica</denchmark-link> let's add this for the next release. Did you have a chance to fix this yet?
Not yet, I also kind of want the frame diff in the next release too, I'll have that PR out pretty soon.
